title: The Unexpected Guardian: The Adventures of Alice Morris
summary: Alice Morris, a 63-year-old consulting and teaching enthusiast, unexpectedly gains superpowers. Over a week, she uses her new abilities to solve problems and teach valuable lessons in her community.
summaryGerman: Alice Morris, eine 63-jährige Begeisterte in Beratung und Lehrtätigkeit, erhält unerwartet Superkräfte. Innerhalb einer Woche nutzt sie ihre neuen Fähigkeiten, um Probleme zu lösen und wertvolle Lektionen in ihrer Gemeinschaft zu lehren.
summaryDutch: Alice Morris, een 63-jarige liefhebber van consultatie en lesgeven, krijgt onverwachts superkrachten. Gedurende een week gebruikt ze haar nieuwe vaardigheden om problemen op te lossen en waardevolle lessen te geven in haar gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: Alice Morris, passionnée de consultation et d'enseignement âgée de 63 ans, acquiert soudainement des super-pouvoirs. En une semaine, elle utilise ses nouvelles capacités pour résoudre des problèmes et enseigner des leçons précieuses dans sa communauté.

story.text: Alice discovers she can manipulate time after a mysterious meteor shower the previous night.
Technical consultant Alice helps prevent a massive data breach at a local school, using her new powers to rewind time and catch the culprit before the attack.
Alice teaches a history class how historical events could have changed with small time alterations, spurring deep interest and discussion among students.
During a quiet evening, Alice experiments with her abilities, discovering she can only rewind time up to 24 hours.
Alice meets another superhero, sparking a romantic evening as they share tales of their adventures and challenges.
Faced with a critical decision, Alice uses her powers strategically in a local election to ensure the most honest candidate wins, subtly influencing the course of events.
Alice reflects on her week, feeling happy and fulfilled for having made a positive impact on her town.

ending: The week with Alice showed that age is just a number, and heroism comes in many forms.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, no matter how and when it is acquired.
